00014 #ifndef THREADLOCAL_H_
00015 #define THREADLOCAL_H_
00016 
00017 #include <support.h>
00018 
00019 #if defined __GNUC__ && __GNUC__ >= 4
00020 // #define USE__THREAD_TLS
00021 #endif
00022 
00023 //! Thread Local Storage template.
00024 //! \p T must have constructor T()
00025 //! object \p T will be deleted only when the thread is finished.
00026 template <typename T>
00027 class XThreadLocal
00028 {
00029 public:
00030     XThreadLocal();
00031     ~XThreadLocal();
00032     //! \return return thread local object. Create an object if not allocated.
00033     T &operator*() const;
00034     //! \sa operator T&()
00035     T *operator->() const;
00036 private:
00037     mutable pthread_key_t m_key;
00038     static void delete_tls(void *var);
00039 };
00040 
00041 #ifdef USE__THREAD_TLS
00042 
00043 template <typename T>
00044 class XThreadLocalPOD
00045 {
00046 public:
00047     XThreadLocalPOD() {}
00048     ~XThreadLocalPOD() {}
00049     //! \return return thread local object. Create an object if not allocated.
00050     T &operator*() const {return m_var;}
00051     //! \sa operator T&()
00052     T *operator->() const {return &m_var;}
00053 private:
00054     static __thread T m_var;
00055 };
00056     
00057 #endif /*USE__THREAD_TLS*/
00058 
00059 template <typename T>
00060 XThreadLocal<T>::XThreadLocal() {
00061     int ret = pthread_key_create(&m_key, &XThreadLocal<T>::delete_tls);
00062     ASSERT(!ret);
00063 }
00064 template <typename T>
00065 XThreadLocal<T>::~XThreadLocal() {
00066     int ret = pthread_key_delete(m_key);
00067     ASSERT(!ret);
00068 }
00069 template <typename T>
00070 void
00071 XThreadLocal<T>::delete_tls(void *var) {
00072     delete reinterpret_cast<T*>(var);
00073 }
00074 template <typename T>
00075 T &XThreadLocal<T>::operator*() const {
00076     void *p = pthread_getspecific(m_key);
00077     if(p == NULL) {
00078         int ret = pthread_setspecific(m_key, p = 
00079 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGCCPP
00080                                     new (NoGC) T);
00081 #else
00082                                     new T);
00083 #endif
00084         ASSERT(!ret);
00085     }
00086     return *reinterpret_cast<T*>(p);
00087 }
00088 template <typename T>
00089 T *XThreadLocal<T>::operator->() const {
00090     return &(**this);
00091 }
00092         
00093 #endif /*THREADLOCAL_H_*/
